Morning.Text1: Good morning, comrade! This is your first day.

Evening.Text1: Congratulations on completing your first day!

Morning.Text1: Good morning, comrade! This is your second day.
Morning.Text2: Hey... comrade, it's me... Fero... it's been a while. I hope you're doing well and your wife is as well. You know... I heard somewhere you got that job... at the borders... you know... Could you do me a favor? Today, around 10 in the morning... Could you do that for me? Comrade, I would be forever grateful. Please...

Evening.Text1: Congratulations on completing your second day!
